enhanced_resume:
Manav Sonawane
Phone: 9920583987 | Email: sonawanemanav96@gmail.com | Location: Mumbai, India
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/manav-sonawane-889911313/ | GitHub: github.com/Code-With-Mnv

### Education

**Thadomal Shahani Engineering College (TSEC)**, Bandra, Mumbai
*   Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology (B.E. IT) | Expected Graduation: May 2026
*   Currently in Second Year (S.E.)
*   First Year SGPA: 8.87/10.0 (Semester I)

**Atomic Energy Central School 4**, Mumbai
*   Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) in Science (PCM-CS with Python) | Achieved: 88.4% | Completed: 2022

### Skills

*   **Programming Languages:** Python, C, C++, Java, JavaScript
*   **Web Technologies:** HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Flask
*   **Concepts:** Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Data Structures & Algorithms (DSA)
*   **Version Control:** Git, GitHub
*   **Data Science:** NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Data Visualization, Data Analysis
*   **Tools & APIs:** SMTPLIB, Twilio, Web Scraping

### Projects

*   **Razor Website Enhancement**
    *   Enhanced the user interface (UI) and visual appeal of the Razor website by integrating 3D illustrations using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
*   **Buckly - Bucket List Website**
    *   Developed an interactive Bucket List Website utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
*   **Personal Blog Website**
    *   Created a dynamic Blog Website with user authentication and content management capabilities, leveraging HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and SQLite.
*   **Automated Python Solutions Suite**
    *   Developed a diverse suite of automated Python applications, including a Flight Deal Finder, House Deal Finder, Spotify Playlist Maker, Amazon Price Tracker, LinkedIn Job Application Bot, Instagram Scroller, and Internet Speed Complaint Bot.
    *   Utilized various APIs, SMTPLIB, Twilio, and web scraping techniques to achieve automation and data retrieval.

### Certifications & Courses

*   Completed certifications and courses in: Python, Machine Learning, Web Development (Basic), C/C++, Microsoft Office Specialist (MSCIT), AutoCAD, Basic Artificial Intelligence (AI), Natural Language Processing (NLP), and OpenCV, acquired from reputable institutes and online platforms.

### Hobbies & Interests

*   Software Development, Web Development & UI/UX, Problem Solving & Competitive Programming
*   Gaming, Sports (Kabaddi, Cricket), Railways
